tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE email_campaign_data (
    campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    total_recipients INT,
    open_rate FLOAT,
    click_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    target_audience VARCHAR(255),
    total_recipients INT,
    total_opened INT,
    total_clicked INT
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (
    performance_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    open_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    click_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    conversion_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    revenue_generated DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE EmailCampaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    email_subject VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignRecipients (
    recipient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    recipient_email VARCHAR(255),
    recipient_name VARCHAR(255),
    recipient_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignPerformance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    recipient_id INT,
    open_count INT,
    click_count INT,
    conversion_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE EmailCampaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_recipients INT,
    total_opened INT,
    total_clicked INT
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignAnalytics (
    campaign_id INT,
    analytics_date DATE,
    total_opened INT,
    total_clicked INT,
    total_conversions INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (campaign_id, analytics_date)
);

CREATE TABLE EmailRecipients (
    recipient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_address TEXT,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    subscription_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE EmailCampaigns (
	campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	start_date DATE NOT NULL,
	end_date DATE,
	sent_emails INT,
	opened_emails INT,
	clicked_emails INT
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignPerformance (
	performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	campaign_id UUID REFERENCES EmailCampaigns(campaign_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
	date DATE NOT NULL,
	sent_emails INT,
	opened_emails INT,
	clicked_emails INT
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignStats (
	stat_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	campaign_id UUID REFERENCES EmailCampaigns(campaign_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
	date DATE NOT NULL,
	total_sent_emails INT,
	total_opened_emails INT,
	total_clicked_emails INT
);
